description:
This module provides utility functions on items. For example,
 it provides a function that allows estimating the size in bytes
 that a given item allocates in memory.

functions.name: size
functions.description: Computes the size in bytes of the given item in main memory.
functions.summary: Computes the size in bytes of the given item in main memory.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: the item whose size to compute.

returns.description: the size allocated by the item in bytes.
